summary: VAN STOPPED SUDDENLY ON EXPRESSWAY.  DEALER TOWED IT AWAY AND DIAGNOSED PROBLEM.  HE SAID THAT CAM SHAFT WAS SEIZED OR BROKE.  ALL FLUID LEVELS WERE OK.  CAR HAD NO LEAKS .  FOUND NO EVIDENCE OF SLUDGE IN THE MOTOR.  FOUND THAT VAN WAS PROPERLY MAINTAINED BY OWNER.  QUOTED NEW ENGINE COST OF $4693.  *AK
